SELECT A.NODE_ID , A.MOCK_NODE_ID , A.NODE_NM , A.NODE_ENM , A.NODE_TYPE , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.TM_X , A.TM_Y , A.ENTRY_RECOG_RADS , A.ADVNC_RECOG_RADS , A.USE_YN , A.UPD_DTM , A.UPD_ID , IF(D.CNT > 0 , 'CE001','CE002') COND_ERROR , E.ROUT_ID , E.NODE_SN FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN E INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST R ON E.ROUT_ID = R.ROUT_ID AND R.DEL_YN !='Y' LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN F ON E.ROUT_ID = F.ROUT_ID AND E.LINK_ID = F.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST A ON E.NODE_ID = A.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT B.NODE_ID, COUNT(B.NODE_ID) CNT FROM BMS_FCLT_INFO B LEFT JOIN BMS_FCLT_COND_INFO C ON B.MNG_ID = C.MNG_ID WHERE FCLT_COND = 'FC021' GROUP BY NODE_ID) D ON A.NODE_ID = D.NODE_ID
WHERE A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002'
AND E.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
ORDER BY E.ROUT_ID, E.NODE_SN
SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID GROUP BY REP_ROUT_ID ORDER BY B.REP_ROUT_NM
SELECT ORG_ID ,ORG_NM FROM BMS_ORG_MST WHERE ORG_DIV = 'OD008'

SELECT a.ROUT_ID, a.LINK_ID, a.LINK_SN, a.MORN_STD, b.LINK_NM, b.ST_NODE_ID AS NODE_ID, b.ED_NODE_ID, c.NODE_TYPE, c.NODE_NM, c.GPS_X, c.GPS_Y, d.GPS_X AS ED_GPS_X, d.GPS_Y AS ED_GPS_Y, d.NODE_TYPE AS ED_NODE_TYPE, d.NODE_NM AS ED_NODE_NM FROM BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN a LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_LINK_MST b ON a.LINK_ID=b.LINK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_NODE_MST c ON b.ST_NODE_ID = c.NODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_NODE_MST d ON b.ED_NODE_ID = d.NODE_ID WHERE a.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} ORDER BY a.LINK_SN
